body:
From what i understood Saori was dumped by her boyfriend, apparently he didn’t wants kids. So Miho being drunk confessed her feelings, Saori took her home because she was being too loud. And finally accepted her and they had sex, both bought condoms without each other’s knowledge. They finally have sex and officially start dating.
The next day Miho says something like “I’ll be in your care” to which Saori replies “Yup, Let's make two or more children!”
So yeah good ending!

#300083 Would be part 2 :)
